perturbation.original_text: During the Term, the Company shall pay the Royalty Fee, earned for the preceding quarter, to the Professional quarterly, within thirty (30) days of the end of the succeeding calendar year quarter.
perturbation.changed_text: During the Term, the Company shall pay the Royalty Fee, earned for the preceding quarter, to the Professional quarterly, within sixty (60) days of the end of the preceding calendar quarter.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that the Royalty Fee will be paid within 30 days of the *succeeding* quarter, while the modified text specifies 60 days of the *preceding* quarter, creating a direct contradiction regarding the payment deadline.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement shall terminate automatically if the Professional dies or becomes disabled, or suffers illness, mental or physical disability to the extent that she is unable to perform the obligations of the Professional under the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement shall terminate automatically if the Professional dies. In the event of disability or illness, the company reserves the right to decide whether the contract continues.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the contract terminates automatically upon disability or illness. The modified text implies the company has the discretion to continue or terminate the contract in those circumstances, conflicting with the automatic termination clause.

perturbation.original_text: To avoid any possibility of confusion of the public, trademark infringement or interference with the rights of the Company, the Professional agrees not to endorse, license or otherwise authorize the use of her name, likeness or image in connection with another company's golf clubs or golf-related clothing or equipment during the Term and for a period of two (2) years thereafter.
perturbation.changed_text: To avoid any possibility of confusion of the public, trademark infringement or interference with the rights of the Company, the Professional agrees not to endorse, license or otherwise authorize the use of her name, likeness or image in connection with another company's golf clubs or golf-related clothing or equipment during the Term. However, after the term concludes, she may endorse other brands with no restrictions.
perturbation.explanation: The original text has a two-year restriction on endorsements post-term. The modified text removes this restriction, stating she can endorse other brands freely after the term, directly contradicting the original non-compete clause and creating uncertainty regarding the extent of the endorsement restrictions.
